abstract: The markets skidded, as the latest unemployment figures raised concerns about the strength of the recovery.
snippet: The markets skidded, as the latest unemployment figures raised concerns about the strength of the recovery.
lead_paragraph: Stocks tumbled Friday in one of their sharpest declines this year, leaving the Dow Jones industrial average firmly below 10,000, as a disappointing jobs report cast a pall over the nation’s economic recovery.

headline.main: U.S. Indexes Fall Sharply on Jobs Data
headline.print_headline: STOCKS AND BONDS; Report on Jobs Dashes Investors’ Hopes, and Shares Tumble
